short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your browser using word commands. Save time and be more productive on your browser time by using only commands!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a command lover? Do you want to save time and open a new browser tab by simply writing one-word command? Browser Commands can help you save time and be more productive on your browser time by using only commands! This extension helps you to replace keyboard shortcuts with word commands.

Instead of remembering the keyboard shortcuts you can use simple English words to trigger commands on your Chrome browser. 

How to open new tab using Browser Commands:
1. Open command input popup using (CTRL + Comma) shortcut. (Command + Comma) for MAC users.
2. Enter "new tab" command.
3. New tab opens up.

How to add a website as bookmark on a folder
1. Open command input popup using (CTRL + Comma) shortcut. (Command + Comma) for MAC users.
2. Enter "bookmark add folder={Folder name}" command.
3. Bookmark added.


Features:
- 10+ commands
- Add own command shortcuts
- 6+ command input themes
- Custom shortcut to show the command input
- Online documentation

All commands:

new tab - Open new tab
new window - Open new window
tab close - Close current tab
reload - Reload page
bookmark add folder={} - Add page as bookmark to a folder
bookmark remove folder={} - Remove bookmark from a folder
print - Print page
zoom in - Zoom in tab
zoom out - Zoom out tab
go to url={} - Open new tab and go to url entered
options - Open extension options page
minimize - Minimize window
maximize - Maximize window
fullscreen - Fullscreen window
normal - Window normal mode
